method.name: CC_1

time.label: Time:
time.description: Maximum duration of the CC step

E_range.label: E range
E_range.description: Select the voltage range of the potentiostat

I_range.label: I range
I_range.description: Select the current range of the potentiostat

is_delta.label: Δ$I$:
is_delta.description: Is the step current a $\Delta$ from previous step?

n_cycles.label: Number of cycles:
n_cycles.description: Cycle through the current technique N times.

exit_on_limit.label: Exit when limits reached?
exit_on_limit.description: Stop the whole experiment when limit is reached?

record_every_dE.label: Record every $dE$:
record_every_dE.description: Record a datapoint at prescribed voltage spacing

record_every_dt.label: Record every $dt$:
record_every_dt.description: Record a datapoint at prescribed time spacing

limit_current_max.label: Maximum current:
limit_current_max.description: Define the upper limit of current for this step

limit_current_min.label: Minimum current:
limit_current_min.description: Define the lower limit of current for this step

limit_voltage_max.label: Maximum voltage:
limit_voltage_max.description: Define the upper limit of voltage for this step

limit_voltage_min.label: Minimum voltage:
limit_voltage_min.description: Define the lower limit of voltage for this step

method.description: Controlled current technique, with optional voltage and current limits

method.name: LOOP_1

goto.label: Go to:
goto.description: Index of the technique to go back to

n_gotos.label: Repeats
n_gotos.description: Number of times the technique will jump; set to -1 for unlimited

method.description: Loop technique, allowing to repeat a set of preceding techniques in a technique array
